title: (x) Seemingly a mix of Trebuchet and Boulder - Myriad {Jan Erdmann}
content:
Hi guys :)

Can someone help me to identify this font?  
I couldn't find it on identifont either :(

Thanks for the help ! ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045434/http:/typophile.com/files/font_30.gif) | 33.22 KB |
author: sleidia

comments.content:
wow ... allow me to bow revently in front of you ahaha ;)  
Unlike me, you didn't allow the squooshing to confuse you.

Thanks again :)
I’d rather say it’s some Myriad (bold, bold condensed?) being squooshed.

"Boulder"?

Curious about the name since I named one of my font Boulder and it looks nothing like that.

[http://typophile.com/boulder](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045434/http:/typophile.com/boulder "http://typophile.com/boulder")

ChrisL
Well, I just found it on some websites for a free download. But it looks like a knock-off from a heavyweight Kabel.

Rainer,  
Any idea when it was dated?

ChrisL
Myriad = Frutiger... Do we have to go there again? ; )
